description: Impose changing emissions of RCP3.4 extension overshoot short lived gas species including CH4, NOx, VOCs and CO.  Beginning in 2100, linearly reduce forcings from 3.4 W/m2 pathway to 2.6 W/m2 by 2250.
name: RCP34-extension-overshoot Short Lived Gas Species
rationale: The scenario can be seen as an overshoot of the 3.4 W/m2 level (which it exceeds and then returns to by about 2100) and an overshoot of the 2.6 W/m2 level, which it returns to in the 23rd century.
longName: Representative Concentration Pathway 3.4 extension Overshoot Short Lived Gas Species
keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 3.4 extension overshoot, future, scenario, SSP5, RCP3.4 extension overshoot, NTCF, Short-lived Gas
